articles.title: NFL preseason winners, losers: Cowboys, Browns out of sorts in Week 1 - USA TODAY
articles.description: The first week of the NFL preseason featured a few star turns from rookie quarterbacks and wide receivers as well as some notable missteps.
articles.content:
The NFL preseason has become an increasingly difficult setting from which to glean any useful information.
